name: WP Customize Login Page
author: Carlo La Pera

sections.description:
You can customize the login page without having to have any technical knowledge in the field.

Install plugin after enable to custom design.

  1. Enable custom design
  2. HTML background image or color set.
  3. Custom logo image.
  4. Custom logo url.
  5. Custom logo title.
  6. Login form background image or color set.
  7. Login form shadow color set.
  8. Login form label color set.
  9. Login form input background color set.
  10. Login form button background and color set.
  11. Login form button hover background and color set.
  12. Login form button border color set.
  13. Login form button hover border color set.
  14. Login form button shadow color set.
  15. Login form button hover shadow color set.
  16. Login form button text shadow color set.
  17. Login form button hover text shadow color set.
  18. Login link color set.
  19. Login link hover color set.
  20. Login border notifications color set.
  21. Export all settings.
  22. Import settings file.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload wp-customize-login-page to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Settings/wclp Options to edit your settings.
  4. Set your customizations.
  5. checkbox check for “enable” in status box.

For more details please visit our website
http://carlolapera.com
sections.faq:
What about?

I created this plugin to make it possible even novice users to customize the login page.
